ebl::state

ebl::state Class Reference

#include <Ebm.h>

Public Member Functions

virtual void clear ()
virtual void clear_dx ()
virtual void clear_ddx ()
virtual void update_gd (gd_param &arg)

Detailed Description

abstract class that stores a state. it must support the following methods clear (clear values), clear_dx (clear gradients), clear_ddx (clear hessian), and update_gd(arg) (update with gradient descent.
